content.raw: It seems a little better, but there still seems to be some problems with rolling objects. In a world file named wireframe.xml [(download here)](https://docs.google.com/open?id=0BzevR20K5H81MmJoZ0ZLTVduTFU), several spheres drop onto an inclined ramp. When selecting these spheres, the bounding box seems to have a different size each time I open that world in gazebo.
content.html: It seems a little better, but there still seems to be some problems with rolling objects. In a world file named wireframe.xml (download here), several spheres drop onto an inclined ramp. When selecting these spheres, the bounding box seems to have a different size each time I open that world in gazebo.
